Text:
The correct DVD title is White Night Wedding (2008). Since this is an Icelandic film, it would be nice to specify soundtrack and possible subtitles.
http://www.amazon.com/dp/B002EOVXC4?tag=imdb-adbox
A seeded torrent with English subs is found here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5095081/White.Night.Wedding.2008.DVDRip.XviD-VH-PROD.
